item.title: Father of Minneapolis shooting victim speaks out. And, CDC announces new leadership
item.description: The father of a boy killed in the Minneapolis church shooting speaks out on how he wants his son to be remembered. And, a new acting CDC director has been announced.

item.title: Thai court dismisses prime minister over compromising phone call with Cambodian leader
item.description: Thailand's Constitutional Court on Friday dismissed Paetongtarn Shinawatra from her position as prime minister, ruling that as the country's leader she violated constitutional rules on ethics.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Contract breach or banditry? Inside the collapse of the Taliban's oil deal with China
